description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the vulnerability identified by CVE-2023-6508 related to use-after-free in media stream within Chromium:

1. Update Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) to version 120.0.2210.61.
2. Restart your browser to apply the security updates.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the security vulnerability that was assigned to CVE-2023-6508, enhancing the security posture of the Microsoft Edge browser. The issue is addressed in the latest Chromium architecture utilized by Edge.
- Version information for this release: Microsoft Edge version 120.0.2210.61, released on December 7, 2023.
- For additional details, refer to the Google Chrome releases page: [Google Chrome Releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2023).
